sections.title: Send Emails With One Hand
sections.text: You are at dinner with a client and they just got up to go to the bathroom. This is an amazing time to whip out {{OutreachPRO}} and send process through 25 new prospects. With one hand you can swipe through all templates that you have created or even create a new one.

sections.title: Know Who Is Likely To Buy
sections.text: Not sure that you should spend resources looking into a new prospect? {{OutreachPRO}} is constantly crawling the internet and aggrigating data about prospects in your pipeline so you don't need to.

sections.title: Send An Email At The Perfect Time
sections.text: Timing is everything in sales. {{OutreachPRO}} allows you to configure set 'timeslots' to send your emails out. Once the timeslots are setup, anytime you press the send button we automatically send the email out durring the next avaiable timeslot.

sections.title: See Whats Working
sections.text: No longer do you need to send emails out into the void. {{OutreachPRO}}
